pages.text: $(l:crafting/runic_shears)Runic Shears$() allow you to reach briefly between the realms, plucking from an otherworldly equivalent of an animal (or plant) a fey item.$(br2)Mystic feathers can be obtained from many creatures that are feathered. A complete list of suitable entities can be found with $(sources:roots:mystic_feather)JEI$().
